title: Large-Scale Discussion-Based Constructivist Science Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of fundamental scientific theories and experience with experimental tools
context.additional_context: A blended environment where in-service professionals collaboratively explore work-integrated science knowledge through BYOD-enabled online discussions and offline lab sessions.

learning_goals: Learners can resolve conceptual conflicts in scientific phenomena using discussion strategies based on constructivist principles.
Learners can interpret experimental data and develop science models applicable to real-life contexts through peer feedback and reflective thinking.
Learners can lead three or more structured discussion sessions using digital collaboration tools, contributing to the formation of a learning community.

resources: Science Experiment Kits and Measurement Equipment

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
